notes_display: Red and black ink.  Benjamin Betterton| William Kenly.  Betterton in red ink.  Visible flecks of mica.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: FORTY SHILLINGS. THIS BILL shall pass current for FORTY SHILLINGS, according to an ACT of GENERAL ASSEMBLY of the Common-Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the Tenth day of April, A.D. 1777. FORTY SHILLINGS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Forty Shillings. | To Counterfeit is Death. | PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777.
